name: Island Walk
description:
Island Walk (0.21)
=========
A  short walking game where the goal is to find all of the boxes scattered over a small archipelago. There are 27 boxes to find. Boxes feature art by illustrator Katya Polezhaeva (http://www.katyapolezhaeva.com). Try to beat your best time, and leave a comment below with your time. All feedback welcome.

Controls:
WASD/Arrows = move
Space = jump
Enter = pick up box
-/+ = change FOV
Esc/Alt F4 = Quit
